jd: From: Deeksha Rawat, KK Software Associates LLC deeksha.r@kksoftwareassociates.com Reply to: deeksha.r@kksoftwareassociates.com Role: Sr. Java Developer Location: ONSITE from Phoenix, AZ or Charlotte, NC from Day 1 Only H4 EAd and L2 EAD Job Description/Responsibilities • Candidate should be ready to work from the client's office for at least 3 days a week. • Proficiency in Java 17 with experience in Writing REST API, and backend logic (batch jobs / Kafka processors) using Spring boot • Exposure to Non-Relational DB like MongoDB. • Hands-on experience with Kafka is a must • Proficient in using and adopting CICD Devops tools like GitHub, Jenkins, Urban Code Deploy/Harness, etc. • Candidate should be able to work as an individual contributor • Candidate should have exposure to microservice applications • Associate should have good analytical skills, and should be able to debug the application and understand the concepts. What are the top 3 Must-Haves for this role? • Hands-on knowledge in designing and delivering Java/ J2EE • Hands-on experience with Kafka and Mongo DB • Hands-on experience with Azure and spring boot Regards Deeksha Rawat | Technical Recruiter Aarna Technologies LLC. 8105 Rasor Blvd, suite # 282, Plano, TX 75024 Direct: +1 (469) 343-4759 | Fax: (614) 413-34
